name: Taxi Customer: Driving SIM
description:
Taxi Customer: Driving SIM is not an ordinary mobile taxi driving game; here you’ve to accept ride request on your smartphone and reach on location to pick customer. Just after requesting for your high tech hq taxi service, passengers are waiting to get in yellow cab and reach their destination.
Features:
- Enjoy realistic NY city environment !
- Easy & smooth controls
- City traffic signal & addictive gameplay
- Highly Additive & Immersive Gameplay
- Real-time crime Racing.
